content.description: Full-stack gamified social media content planner with streak tracking and scheduling features
content.intro: Built to solve the challenge of maintaining consistent posting schedules through gamification and visual progress tracking.
content.body: Implemented user authentication, post scheduling system, and real-time progress tracking using React, TypeScript, and Firebase backend.
content.conclusion: Contact me for test account credentials. See the GitHub repository for technical implementation details and architecture. Stack: React, Firebase, TypeScript
content.imageAltText: Screenshot of social streak web app

content.description: Client-side image story application with automated 24-hour expiration using browser localStorage
content.intro: Developed to demonstrate local-first web development patterns and time-based content management without backend infrastructure.
content.body: Implemented client-side image upload, storage, and automated expiration logic using React and Tailwind CSS.
content.conclusion: View the GitHub repository for implementation details and technical approach. Stack: React, Tailwind

content.description: Infleuncer website built with Astro framework for youtuber NinaLuciaW
content.intro: Developed to demonstrate developing based on client requirements through thoughtful design and implementation.
content.body: Implemented RSS feed fetching, responsive design, and modern UI patterns using Astro and Tailwind CSS.
content.conclusion: Project demonstrates proficiency with modern frontend frameworks and client-focused development. Stack: Astro, Tailwind
content.imageAltText: Screenshot of youtuber NinaLuciaW's landing page

content.description: Minimalist Reddit client focused on displaying newest content from customizable subreddit feeds
content.intro: Built to practice third-party API integration and state management for dynamic content filtering.
content.body: Implemented custom subreddit selection, real-time content fetching via Reddit API, and responsive minimal UI design.
content.conclusion: See the GitHub repository for API integration approach and technical details. Stack: React, Reddit API
content.imageAltText: Screenshot of Newitt client web app

content.description: Professional landing page built with Astro framework for music artist pronouncedyea
content.intro: Developed to demonstrate modern static site generation and performance optimization techniques.
content.body: Implemented responsive design, optimized asset loading, and modern UI patterns using Astro and Tailwind CSS.
content.conclusion: Project demonstrates proficiency with modern frontend frameworks and performance-focused development. Stack: Astro, Tailwind
content.imageAltText: Screenshot of musician pronouncedyea's landing page

content.description: Configurable browser-based quiz application with timer, scoring system, and dynamic content loading from JSON
content.intro: Built as a reusable template demonstrating data-driven UI rendering and state management patterns.
content.body: Implemented JSON-based content system, timer logic, score tracking, and modular component architecture using React.
content.conclusion: See the GitHub repository for the JSON schema specification and implementation details. Stack: React, Tailwind
content.imageAltText: Screenshot of JSON quiz web app

content.description: Mobile-first weather application using Visual Crossing API with location-based forecasting
content.intro: Developed to demonstrate API integration, asynchronous data handling, and mobile-responsive design principles.
content.body: Implemented geolocation services, API error handling, and responsive UI optimized for mobile devices.
content.conclusion: See the GitHub repository for API integration approach and responsive design implementation. Stack: React, Visual Crossing API

content.description: Mobile-optimized Pennsylvania representative lookup tool designed to reduce friction in civic engagement
content.intro: Built to improve user experience for accessing elected official contact information on mobile devices.
content.body: Developed mobile-first UI and API integration framework for rapid representative lookup functionality.
content.conclusion: Currently non-functional due to API availability. See the GitHub repository for implementation framework and architecture. Stack: React, Civic Information API

content.description: Full-stack CRUD blog application built with Express.js backend and vanilla JavaScript frontend
content.intro: Developed to demonstrate backend development fundamentals, RESTful API design, and file system operations.
content.body: Implemented complete CRUD operations, file-based storage system, and frontend-backend communication using Express.js.
content.conclusion: See the GitHub repository for backend architecture and API endpoint documentation. Stack: Express.js, Vanilla JavaScript
content.imageAltText: Screenshot of express personal blog front end

content.description: Additional web development and backend projects demonstrating various technologies and approaches
content.intro: Collection of experimental projects, learning exercises, and smaller applications built throughout development journey.
content.body: Projects range from backend services to frontend experiments, showcasing diverse technical skills and problem-solving approaches.
content.conclusion: Visit the GitHub profile to explore additional projects and implementations. Stack: Various
